name: Youth and Family Services
description: The Ingleside Community Center is focused on helping and growing the youth and community of Ingleside. Offers social activities for kids throughout the year as well as a summer program.
fullDescription: The Ingleside Community Center is focused on helping and growing the youth and community of Ingleside. Offers social activities for kids throughout the year as well as a summer program.
